name: Gratitude
description:
Gratitude is at the foundation of so many of the emotions and feelings we as humans long to feel. When we really take a closer look at the feelings like happiness, joy, contentedness, and feeling connected, one of those emotions cannot be created without a dose of gratitude. 

Gratitude or being grateful involves enjoying the state of life by practicing appreciation. It means appreciating everything we experience in everything we do. 

Let`s set the intention to develop our ability to access gratitude and let that appreciation and peace expand into even the most frustrating of situations. 

Take a deep breath in and breath out slowly. Bring to mind one thing that you are truly grateful for right now.
